summary: The Veterans First Act of 2025, introduced in the Senate, aims to reallocate $2,000,000,000 from the United States Agency for International Development to the Department of Veterans Affairs. This funding is specifically designated for grants to states for the construction, remodeling, and modification of state nursing homes and domiciliary facilities that provide care to veterans, as authorized by sections 8131 through 8138 of title 38 of the United States Code. The funds will remain available until expended.
